definitions.definition: A large ruminant mammal , of species Okapia johnstoni , found in the rainforests of the Congo , related to the giraffe but with a much shorter neck , a reddish - brown coat , and zebra-like stripes on its hindquarters .

main_definition: A large ruminant mammal , of species Okapia johnstoni , found in the rainforests of the Congo , related to the giraffe but with a much shorter neck , a reddish - brown coat , and zebra-like stripes on its hindquarters . [from early 20th c.]
